summary: A small outfit set worn by Selene, a movie character.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=4]Neo's Selene[/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=yellow][size=3] Author : Meister aka Neovinci[/size][/color][/b]

A simple outfit set.
Yes same as you recognize, it is Selene's outfit set in the movie "Underworld".

[youtube]SjFJmZerBno[/youtube][youtube]yR-iYWCrxAg[/youtube]
by EmadWasfi (youtue : Emadwasfi) / by Hodilton (Youtube : Hodilton)

[youtube]wQxd-DnS2sc[/youtube][youtube]xHAyzTaBL4c[/youtube]
by dptheslothking (youtube : slothability) / by sidras01 (youtube : seriezs)

[youtube]t4lPLF2PjMA[/youtube][youtube]V-yLpqXa7XY#t[/youtube]
by misalen ( youtube : SkyttsTV) / bychickenbrothel (youtube : HoppingMadMedia)

Actually it was one of my personal test mods for variable purposes. but not took long after I've finished it, by multiple requests from local community members,facebook and blog friends, it turned to public version on NEXUS.


- Female only

- Character Body type doesn't matter

- Normal and TBBP versions

- Black colour only

- not lore-friendly

- Craftable and Temperable for Light, Heavy, special for Spellswords Armours and Mage outfits

- Elven perk required for Light and Spellsword Armours

- Dwarven perk required for Heavy type Armours

- Steel perk required for Mage outfits

- Mage Outfits and Spellsword Armours are enchanted.

- Light and heavy armours are not enchanted

- This set not includes head part, but higher armour rated than others (definately not balanced)

[b][color=yellow][size=3]- Armour rating : Heavy > Light > Spellsword > Mage (Zero rating)

- Enchant rating : Mage > Spellsword > Light and Heavy (not enchanted)[/size][/color][/b]








After you install it, A Bag contains basic clothing set will be appear near by Riverwood village(see Screenshots).

[b][color=yellow]Included Clothes are main ingredients for each types of armours.[/color][/b]


ex) Light body armour = basic bodysuit + elven ingots + leather strips + etc......


The bag will be respawned few days(in game time) after you got basic clothes.




There is possibility distort outfit shapes with some active poses.



Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)





[b][color=yellow][size=3]Credit[/size][/color][/b]

Used mods for model appearance and screenshots
(available mods only)

Companion Selene Kate by Kasprutz :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36993/?

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?

Enhanced Character Edit by tktk1 :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?

Natural Eyes by nevenbridge81 :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589/?

SSAssis tools by ARAKURE :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47517/?

Skyrim Academy and Pinup Poser S by halofarm :
http://mod.dysintropi.me/





thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

Members of NAVER cafe "Testinghall"

and many Nexus and facebook friends


especially thanks for Kaspruts for Selene images. and Halo for A wonderful studio.
